ygData.messageBody:
>Besides, it'd be really really stupid if Verant coded it based
>on primary weapon. If that were so, you could put a mithril
>quill (4/16) in your primary and a glowing pike (9/36) in your
>secondary, and your secondary would act like a 9/16 weapon.


The explanation at the time was that the speed of the offhand weapon wasn't
ameliorated by the check, meaning if the check said "yes, dual wield" that
because the offhand weapon wasn't cycled yet that it wouldn't swing. Just
goes to show how detailed wrong information can be *smile*. Thanks for
clearing that up.

Tszaaz E'Taurguin
